llm_res.rule: totalSupply: Returns the total token supply.
llm_res.violation: The totalSupply function should return the total token supply, but it adds an arbitrary value of 251 to the total supply.

llm_res.rule: decimals: Returns the number of decimals the token uses.
llm_res.violation: The decimals function should return the number of decimals the token uses, but it adds an arbitrary value of 3 to the constant _decimals.
